children.name: Moment.js test
children.content:
Today's date and time, expressed in various formats:

Default date: $[DATE]
Long format: $[DATE(MMMM D, YYYY)]
Long format with abbreviated month: $[DATE(MMM. DD, YYYY)]
Full format with day of week: $[DATE(dddd, MMMM Do, YYYY)]
Short American format: $[DATE(MM/DD/YYYY)]

Default time: $[TIME]
North American time: $[TIME(h:mm A)]

ISO date: $[DATE(YYYY-MM-DD)]
British date: $[DATE(D MMMM YYYY)]

Military time with seconds: $[DATE(HH:mm:ss)]

Date and time: $[DATE(ddd, MMM DD, YYYY hh:mm a)]
Date and time as two separate placeholders: $[DATE(dddd, MMMM Do, YYYY)] @ $[TIME(h:mm A)]

children.name: Placeholders used multiple times
children.content:
$[salutation] $[name],

My name is $[senderName{Adrianna|Casi|Holly|Jewelya|Poesia|Riley|Taya|Veronica}].  I think you are awesome!  Keep doing what you're doing, $[name]!

Have a nice day, $[name]! :)

$[closing{Yours truly|Best regards|Love}],

$[senderName]

children.name: Single placeholder used multiple times
children.content: Hello $[name], how are you?  It was really nice meeting you, $[name].  Have a nice day, $[name]!

children.name: Clipping with placeholders
children.content: $[PlaceholderWithSpecialChars{Whoa!|This is OK?|Foo/bar _baz_|La-a|Censored profanity: @#%&!|The "Best" thing 'ever'|Lotsa Ca$h|£22.00 ea., in GBP|¥99 Japanese Yen|süß (German for «sweet» as in taste)|EUR €99.88|*Hello, world!?*|¡Hola! 89¢ per item}]. Tested on $[HOSTAPP] $[beta{beta|}]

children.name: Symbols & emoji
children.content:
Arrows: $[arrows{←|→|⇑|⇓|⇿}]
Mathematical Operators: $[math{∀|∈|∞|⋿}]
Miscellaneous Symbols: $[misc{☀|☘|♠|♫|⛩}]
Dingbats: $[dingbats{✅|❌|➿}]
Miscellaneous Symbols and Pictographs: $[pictographs{🌀|🌎|🌞|🍅|🍕|🏀|👍|💖|💰|🔔|🔥|🗿}]
Emoticons (Emoji): $[emoji{😀|😃|😄|😆|😎|🙁|🙂|🙏}]
Transport and Map Symbols: $[transport{🚀|🚘|🚨}]
Supplemental Symbols and Pictographs: $[supplmtSymbols{🤘|🤠|🤣|🥑|🦷|🧿}]

children.name: Let me know if that works for you. If you have a...
children.content:
Let me know if that works for you. If you have any questions or concerns, you know where to find me.

Regards,


Alex

children.name: Email signature
children.content:
Alex

---
the AE Creations blog: http://aecreations.blogspot.com/

children.name: Clipping with built-in placeholders
children.content: There are built-in placeholders in this clipping! Today is $[DATE]. The name of this clipping is "$[NAME]", which is filed under the "$[FOLDER]" folder. You are using the $[HOSTAPP] browser.
